review_data.title: Un’accoglienza e un servizio
review_data.content: Un’accoglienza e un servizio impeccabili. Anche (o specialmente?...) per il cane. Ottima colazione e, sorpresona, un’ottima e inaspettata cioccolata calda......More

review_data.title: Excellent pastry, friendly waitress
review_data.content: Tram #10 or #12 (Glattbrugg-Bahnhof) or Bus #768, will get you there the closest with public transit. Kunzli offers sidewalk seating at the entrance, a rear garden seating area and inside it's a large room with green padded benches and seats. There are plants and...More

review_data.title: Delicious pastry, good coffee
review_data.content: The Kunzli is a wonderful place to get chocolates, croissants, cakes. THe Tea Room is situated near the train station of eighter Glattbrugg or Opfikon in an old building. Also, the interieur is old - but after a great breakfast and friendly staff, you forget...More
